nodes.text: The Retreat at Katraasii was a battle during the Clone Wars that took place on the planet of Katraasii. Clone Commander Jag embarrassed himself during the retreat from Katraasii, and was demoted to Captain for his actions. Luckily for Jag, he was picked up by Jedi General Plo Koon, who drafted Captain Jag as a test pilot for the new ARC-170 starfighters.
